name: Foxxoccino & Hoojao's Source
subtitle: All my apps in one place.
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: StatinUp
apps.subtitle: Control SteamVR Base Stations Power.
apps.localizedDescription:
StationUp lets you effortlessly control the power state of Base Stations 1.0 and 2.0. Built with iOS 26 Liquid Glass design. Fully offline. StationUp delivers an elegant, fully native experience for managing your Base Stations 1.0 and 2.0.
What StationUp Does
• Turn On / Sleep / Standby
Power management for Base Stations 1.0 & 2.0.
• Native Experience
Built with iOS 26 Liquid Glass design.
• Clean, Modern, Lightweight, Fully Offline for Total Privacy
No ads. Fully offline. Just a simple, native experience.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Bluetooth required in order to connect to base stations.
